Jackie Walorski said Mike Pence can appeal to both social and economic conservatives. I know he feels pulled because there is a great campaign to recruit him at the federal level, she said. "I'm going to be excited whatever door he picks." If Mike Pence does decide to run for president, he'll likely have to start working quickly to raise campaign money.
